episodes.title: Open 24/7 Episode 11: Kim Biddle
episodes.summary:
Kim Biddle helped found the Saddleback Justice Task Force and focus on aftercare resource development for caretakers of survivors in Third World countries. Over the years, she has narrowed her focus from global human trafficking to domestic minor sex trafficking, leading her to found Saving Innocence to provide the needed crisis response and advocacy for this underserved population in the United States. Craig Gross to talk to Kim about her life and work in this open video. Check it out then hop on over to her website http://www.savinginnocence.org.

By xxxchurch

Tags : accountability, kim biddle, open 24/7, open 24x7, open24x7, saddleback church

episodes.title: Open 24/7 Episode 9: Bryan Johnston
episodes.summary:
Bryan Johnston is a pastor and long time friend of XXXchurch.com. Bryan is passionate about seeing lives restored from addictions and men and women experiencing freedom. Almost 10 years ago Bryan broke his neck while unloading church staging for his church plant. He was paralyzed and told he would never walk again. We sit down for a chat and talk about the accident and the trials and temptations he faced over last ten years. Sit back and watch what it means to be open. Then get over to http://X3watch.com and get accountable.

By xxxchurch

Tags : accountability, bryan johnston, get open, open 24X7, open24x7
